Name: Apocalypse Rider
About the game: In the scorched wasteland speed is all that matters! Apocalypse Rider is a VR arcade motorcycle game where you must prevail the high-speed wasteland roads, avoid the hostile traffic and keep surviving, speeding and RIDING! • 20 levels of pure VR adrenaline • 5 motorcycles available with dozens of upgrades • Full virtual reality environment • Gamepad and motion controller support. Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
Meta Title: Apocalypse Rider: Aug 23, 2018, VRMonkey and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Apocalypse Rider? Check out the release date (Aug 23, 2018), developer insights from VRMonkey, and a complete game summary.
